action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a city street scene with traffic lights, cars, and a cyclist in a bike lane. There are tall buildings on both sides of the street. The street sign reads "Georgia St." There are trees lining the left side of the street and a parking sign on the right side. The traffic lights are red, and there are people walking on the sidewalks.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a cluttered room with various electronic devices and boxes. There is a computer monitor displaying a grid of images, a keyboard, and a mouse on a small table. Another monitor is mounted on the wall, showing a different screen. The room has pink curtains, a black chair, and various items scattered around, including boxes and what appears to be packaging for figurines or models.
